block-definition.comment: Moves the object using arrow keys or some buttons (such as rdfg)
Moves the object in specific direction without affecting current direction
Returns true if the sprite is pointing in the specific direction
Returns true if the sprite can be dragged with the mouse
Makes the sprite bounce if it touches a spesific sprite
Like the built in Glide block but with effectsof the go to built in block
Returns X and Y of a specific sprite
Forces specific sprites to move x steps
Runs the script only while you can actually drag the sprite using the mouse.
Toggles sprite's draggable state
Runs the script in the 1st inline block. Then until the condition in the predicate input is met, it runs the cslot script first and then the script in the 2nd inline block.
This block works like the built in repeat block but with an upvar variable for use in the script

Accepts any number of scripts as inputs. Launches a separate thread for each of them, so they are done in parallel, then waits for them all to complete. This doesn't change how the Snap! scheduler works; the threads are not truly asynchronous. And there is no increase in speed. Rather, the point of this block is to allow starting synchronized but independent scripts.

Accepts any number of scripts as inputs. Launches a separate thread for each of them, so they are done in parallel, then continues with the current script while they all run. This doesn't change how the Snap! scheduler works; the threads are not truly asynchronous. And there is no increase in speed. Rather, the point of this block is to allow starting synchronized but independent scripts.
Runs a random script from the list of scripts set

Takes an value (Such as text or list) in the 1st input and a reporter in the 2nd ones. The string from the 1st input is then manipulated using the reporters set in the 2nd input slot. (i.e PIPE [10] to (@ + @)-(@ x 2)) returns 40
The opposite of the built in if block

block-definition.s: animate costumes %'c1' and %'c2' %'num' times at %'fps' fps

block-definition.comment: Version of the built in block that allows inputs to be placed on the dropdown menu
Hide All Sprites - Hides every sprite Show All Sprites - Shows every sprite

block-definition.s: animate costumes %'c1' and %'c2' %'num' times at %'fps' fps and run %'action'

custom-block.s: animate costumes %s and %s %n times at %n fps

block-definition.s: say alll possible combinations from %'lists' for %'num' secs
block-definition.comment: Says every combination that can be done with the item of the lists you set

block-definition.s: speak %'text' with %'lang' accent $nl and pitch %'pitch' rate %'rate'
block-definition.translations: de:sprich _ mit _ Aussprache _ und Höhe _ Geschwindigkeit _ pt:fala _ na língua _ _ com tom _ e velocidade _

inputs.input: en-USالعربية=ar Български=bg বাংলা=bn Català=ca Català - Valencià=ca-VA Česky=cs Deutsch=de Dansk=dk Ελληνικά=el English-American=en-US English-British=en-GB Esperanto=eo Español=es Eesti=et Euskara=eu suomi=fi Français=fr Galego=gl Hrvatski=hr Magyar=hu Interlingua=ia Bahasa Indonesia=id Italiano=it 日本語=ja にほんご=ja-HIRA ಕನ್ನಡ=kn 한국어=ko Malayalam=ml Nederlands=nl Norsk=no Polski=pl Português=pt Português do Brasil=pt-BR Român=ro Русский=ru Slovenščina=si svenska=sv Tamil=ta Telagu=te Türkçe=tr Українська=ua 简体中文=zh-CN 繁體中文=zh-TW

block.l: var utter = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance(msg); utter.lang = accent; utter.pitch = pitch; utter.rate = rate; window.speechSynthesis.speak(utter);

block-definition.s: speak %'text' with %'lang' accent $nl and pitch %'pitch' rate %'rate' and wait
block-definition.translations: de:sprich _ mit _ Aussprache _ und Höhe _ Geschwindigkeit _ und warte pt:fala _ na língua _ _ com tom _ e velocidade _ , e espera

inputs.input: en-USالعربية=ar Български=bg বাংলা=bn Català=ca Català - Valencià=ca-VA Česky=cs Deutsch=de Dansk=dk Ελληνικά=el English-American=en-US English-British=en-GB Esperanto=eo Español=es Eesti=et Euskara=eu suomi=fi Français=fr Galego=gl Hrvatski=hr Magyar=hu Interlingua=ia Bahasa Indonesia=id Italiano=it 日本語=ja にほんご=ja-HIRA ಕನ್ನಡ=kn 한국어=ko Malayalam=ml Nederlands=nl Norsk=no Polski=pl Português=pt Português do Brasil=pt-BR Român=ro Русский=ru Slovenščina=si svenska=sv Tamil=ta Telagu=te Türkçe=tr Українська=ua 简体中文=zh-CN 繁體中文=zh-TW

block.l: var utter = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance(msg), isDone = false; utter.lang = accent; utter.pitch = pitch; utter.rate = rate; utter.onend = function () {isDone = true; }; window.speechSynthesis.speak(utter); return function () {return isDone; };

block-definition.comment: Returns the days that have passed since 2000
Reports every other sprite the current one is touching

block-definition.s: rota %'text' and run %'action' with the inputted answer
play note from %'pitch' hz for %'beat' beats

block-definition.comment: Repeats the same string x times without any space added

inputs.input: Hello How are you? Are you okay?
Hello How are you? Are you okay?

block-definition.comment: Like the built in combine block found in the list category but uses string instead of list

inputs.input: Hello How are you? Are you okay?
Hello How are you? Are you okay?
Hello How are you? Are you okay?
Hello How are you? Are you okay? Why not?

block-definition.comment: Returns true if sprite's parent is an object.
CONTAINS = True if the 2nd string is included in the 1st one STARTS WITH = True if the 1st string starts with the 2nd one ENDS WITH = True if the 1st string ends with the 2nd one

block-definition.s: convert %'multiline' to single-line by joining them with %'sep'

inputs.input: Hello How are you? Are you okay?

block-definition.s: trigular pillar sized %'size' at %'dpi' dpi with %'pen' size

block-definition.comment: Returns true if the same list without any sub-lists is empty
Returns true if the list does not include any sub-list

inputs.input: Hello How are you? Are you okay?
